Reviews.Title: Big and clear
Reviews.Author: ExE122
Reviews.Content: This sign is big and clear.  We set up a CCTV system at the construction site where our home was being built after we had a break in and had some materials stolen.  I feel this sign did a good job of warding off any unwanted attention.  We have had no more incidents since we set everything up.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Cornelius J. Donnelly
Reviews.Content: The Sign is very visible and in Multiple Languages !! Large Print is a very effective when approaching the property !!

Reviews.Title: Cardboard sign.  If you are gonna use it indoors, OK.. Otherwise, get something made of plastic or metal
Reviews.Author: M. Vreeland "Mark's"
Reviews.Content: Cardboard sign.  If you are gonna use it indoors, OK.. Otherwise, get something made of plastic or metal  I put it behind my window facing out

Reviews.Title: Great deterrent
Reviews.Author: Javier Mariscal
Reviews.Content: I live in Miami.  You have to have these.  It's not very good quality.  I put them outside my fence.  They seem to be holding up but kind of flimsy.

ProductInfo.Features:
For CCTV Security Camera

ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 18 x 12 Inches Warning Security Sign for CCTV Security Camera Surveillance Video System
